item.title: Gamer Lamp
item.description: In 2017 I started a course to learn more about computer hardware and servers and their uses / configuration. At the end of the course I had to do a conclusion work using all subjects taught. My decision was to make a lamp / lamp be connected remotely by cell phone or computer. For this I used a micro computer called Raspberry PI, it has several buses identical to a normal computer (USB, Ethernet, etc.
